name: Space Evaders - IF Game Jam
description:
1st Prize for Best Game IF Game Jam 2016

Blue Alien and Red Alien are trying to escape from Mars jail while being chained to each other. You must reach the space ship and defeat the evil Purple alien. Avoid rocks and puddles of space mud, but don't forget to pick up some oxygen tank before your stocks runs out.

COMMANDS

1 Player joypad - letf analog stick: Red Alien - right analog stick: Blue Alien.
1 Player keyboard - WASD: Red Alien - directional arrows: Blue Alien.

2 Player joypad - pad 1 left analog stick: Red Alien - pad 2 left analog stick: Blue Alien.

2 Player keyboard - WASD: Red Alien - directional arrows: Blue Alien.

R - restart after game over
B - reach Purple alien directly (coward!) "

Team: Syntactic Sugar
https://www.syntacticsugargames.com/
